ride.title: Fantasy Cups
ride.description: Take a ride into Fantasy Land! Decorated with scenes from some of the classics including Snow White, the Lion King and The Little Mermaid, these fantastic cups and saucers will spin you away to a the land of your dreams.

ride.title: Wild Raft
ride.description: Jump in and hold on tight for a wild, whitewater rafting trip down sets of simulated rapids.

ride.title: Surf's Up
ride.description: Experience the thrill of surfing without getting wet! Sit down on a surfboard-style seat and you’re lifted up into the air for a free-fall experience that’s hilarious fun for all.

ride.title: Bounce Around
ride.description: Jump aboard, and hang on! It’s an all-terrain vehicle with extra bounce in the springs for a fun-filled, rocking ride that the kids will love!

ride.title: Carousel
ride.description: Everyone loves a ride on the prancing horses of the Carousel. Hang on, and wave for the camera!

ride.title: Break Dance
ride.description: Hop around and hold on tight for an experience full of colour, thumping music and thrills.

ride.title: Crazy Cars
ride.description: Crazy The latest from the world of European dodgems, Crazy Cars ramps up the action with the biggest track, the most cars, 8000 throbbing LED lights and a red hot sound system pumping out the beat. Cars are designed by world-leading Italian designers and all cars are fitted with padded seat belts.
